Trigger Example", "release_duration": 0.0, "queueable": false, "command_list": [ { "cmd": 5.0, "obsid": "Main", "pos": 0.0, "vis": true, "ms": 0.0, "sel": false, "dis": false, "xpan": 400.0, "b0": "This example button has one extension triggers:
- DonationAlerts Tip

The name of the DonationAlerts Tip comes from the value we put in the "Имя триггера" field on
the SAMMI-Bridge page.

Trigger Pull Data will get the data out of the Extension Trigger.
The first field you can put anything you want but the "Pull Value" needs to be "tipData" as
show below.

Available Data:
- tipAmount (int)
- tipAmountString (string)
- tipCurrency (string)
- tipCurrencySymbol (string)
- userMessage (string)
- username (string)
